timeline.bodyText:
Undo this reordering. See also sonar rule "pom elements should be in the recommended order (java:S3423)":
The POM Code Convention is the Maven project's internal recommendation for POM element ordering. It calls for listing modifiers in the following order:
<modelVersion/>
<parent/>
<groupId/>
<artifactId/>
<version/>
<packaging/>
<name/>
<description/>
<url/>
<inceptionYear/>
<organization/>
<licenses/>
<developers/>
<contributors/>
<mailingLists/>
<prerequisites/>
<modules/>
<scm/>
<issueManagement/>
<ciManagement/>
<distributionManagement/>
<properties/>
<dependencyManagement/>
<dependencies/>
<repositories/>
<pluginRepositories/>
<build/>
<reporting/>
<profiles/>
timeline.author: smvdheijden

replies.bodyText: Hmm, I  just made this in line with all other modules. I'll revert this change
replies.author: joostknapen

timeline.message: FLEX-5532: Revert osgp-adapter-kafka-distribution pom.xml to previous version

timeline.bodyText:
If you add these modules, you should probably have to add these two dependencies to components in shared  as well:
    <module>../shared/osgp-kafka-distributionautomation</module>
    <module>../shared/osgp-kafka-logger</module>
timeline.author: smvdheijden

replies.bodyText: These modules are already in the pom
